{"id":983837410,"question_id":8,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1688225680,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/983837410/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"42.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int myAtoi(String s) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = 0;\n        int idx = 0;\n        boolean negative = false;\n        String allowed = \" 0123456789+-\";\n        while(idx < s.length() && allowed.indexOf(s.charAt(idx)) == 0) {\n            left++;\n            idx++;\n        }\n        if(idx < s.length() && allowed.indexOf(s.charAt(idx)) > 10) {\n            if(allowed.indexOf(s.charAt(idx)) == 12) negative = true;\n            left++;\n            idx++;\n        } \n        while(idx < s.length() && allowed.indexOf(s.charAt(idx)) == 1) {\n            left++;\n            idx++;\n        }\n        while(idx < s.length() && \n            allowed.indexOf(s.charAt(idx)) > 0 && \n            allowed.indexOf(s.charAt(idx)) < 11) {\n\n            right++;\n            idx++;\n        }\n        right += left;\n        String r = (negative ? \"-\" : \"\") + s.substring(left, right);\n        System.out.println(r);\n        if(r.length() > 11) return ((\"\" + r.charAt(0)).equals(\"-\") ? (int) -Math.pow(2, 31) : (int) (Math.pow(2, 31)-1));\n        long lNum;\n        try {\n            lNum = Long.valueOf(r);\n        } catch(Exception e) {\n            return 0;\n        }\n        if(lNum > Math.pow(2, 31)-1) return (int) (Math.pow(2, 31)-1);\n        if(lNum < -Math.pow(2, 31)) return (int) -Math.pow(2, 31);\n        return (int) lNum;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
